name: Vision Origin
description: The Vision Origin is based on the development of the UE4 VR FPS games , players play mercenaries to escape from blocking the planet with important information back to the earth, in addition to kill the monster , the player avoid many organs , sit on the spacecraft back to earth.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: I5-6500 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: I7-4970 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 1070 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 8 GB available space
